property.name: _factorname
property.doc: Factory Name used in the Trait Sequence

property.name: _mandatory
property.doc: Mandatory Field of the module used in Trait Sequence

property.name: _modulename
property.doc: Module name used in Trait Sequence

property.name: _private
property.doc: Private Field of the module used in Trait Sequence

property.name: length
property.doc: Length of the image associated with the polynomial

property.name: width
property.doc: Width of the image associated with the polynomial

property.name: azimuthsteeringrate
property.doc: Azimuth steering rate in radians per sec

property.name: azimuthtimeinterval
property.doc: Azimuth time interval between lines in seconds

property.name: burststartutc
property.doc: Actual sensing time corresponding to start of the burst

property.name: burststoputc
property.doc: Actual sensing time corresponding to end of the burst

property.name: length
property.doc: Length of the image associated with the polynomial

property.name: width
property.doc: Width of the image associated with the polynomial

property.name: firstvalidline
property.doc: First valid line in the burst SLC

property.name: firstvalidsample
property.doc: First valid sample in the burst SLC

property.name: metadata_location
property.doc: Location of the metadata file where the instance was defined

property.name: numberofvalidlines
property.doc: Number of valid lines in the burst SLC

property.name: numberofvalidsamples
property.doc: Number of valid samples in the burst SLC

property.name: _mandatory
property.doc: Mandatory Field of the module used in Trait Sequence

property.name: _modulename
property.doc: Module name used in Trait Sequence

property.name: _private
property.doc: Private Field of the module used in Trait Sequence

property.name: rangepixelsize
property.doc: Slant range pixel size in m

property.name: sensingstart
property.doc: UTC time corresponding to first line of burst SLC

property.name: sensingstop
property.doc: UTC time corresponding to last line of burst SLC

property.name: startingrange
property.doc: Slant range to first pixel in m

property.name: terrainheight
property.doc: Average terrain height used for focusing

property.name: numberofbursts
property.doc: Number of bursts in the product

component.name: reference
component.doc: reference of the stack to be coregistered to

property.name: ascendingnodetime
property.doc: Ascending node time corresponding to the acquisition
